r.d: Text_Password allows one to create pronounceable and unpronounceable passwords. The full functional range is explained in the manual at http://pear.php.net/manual/.
r.n: * Improved performance * Added alphabetical character set for creating passwords (by Aaron Wormus) * Added unit tests * Fixed bug #2605 * Fixed problematic seeding of the randon number generator (hint by Stefan Esser)
